Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 5. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.3. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED BEFORE JOING ARMY 3. MARRIED AFTER JOINING ARMY 4. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.5. CHECK THE ANSWER THAT TELLS BEST HOW FAR YOU WENT IN SCHOOL:  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. FINISHED GRADE SCHOOL 3. HAD SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. HAD SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 5 06. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 6 07. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 7 08. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 8 09. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 9 10. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF 0 11. ORIGINAL PUNCH OF X 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THAT THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.12. HOW ABOUT YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR REGULAR DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY*  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 13A, 13B AND 13C NOT CODED.

Q.14. DO YOU THINK EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO FIT YOU INTO THE JOB YOU ARE BEST SUITED FOR IN YOUR OUTFIT*  1. EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE 2. SOMEWHAT MORE COULD HAVE BEEN DONE 3. A LOT MORE COULD HAVE BEEN DONE 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.15. IS MOST OF YOUR TIME ON DUTY SPENT DOING THINGS RELATED TO YOUR MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME ON MY MAIN ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT 2. NO, I SPEND MOST OF MY TIME ON OTHER DUTIES 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.16. HOW WELL SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JOB*  1. VERY WELL SATISFIED 2. FAIRLY SATISFIED 3. SOMEWHAT DISSATISFIED 4. VERY MUCH DISSATISFIED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.17. DID YOU EVER HAVE A CHANCE TO SAY WHAT KIND OF AN ARMY JOB YOU WOULD LIKE*  1. YES, I HAD A CHANCE TO SAY AND GOT THE JOB I ASKED FOR 2. YES, I HAD A CHANCE TO SAY BUT DIDN,T GET THE JOB I ASKED FOR 3. NO, I NEVER HAD A CHANCE TO SAY 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.18. DO YOU THINK YOUR ABILITIES AND PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE FIT YOU BETTER FOR SOME OTHER ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, I WOULD FIT BETTER IN A DIFFERENT JOB 2. NO, I AM BEST FITTED FOR MY PRESENT JOB 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.

Q.21. DID YOU EVER GO TO AN ARMY SPECIALIST SCHOOL (SUCH AS COOK, AIRPLANE ENGINE MECHANIC, RADIO OPERATOR, TRUCK DRIVER, ETC.*)  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 21A NOT CODED.

Q.22. IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT HOW MUCH ARE YOU USING THE TRAINING YOU GOT AT THE SPECIALIST SCHOOL YOU WENT TO*  1. DID NOT GO TO A SPECIALIST SCHOOL 2. I USE MY TRAINING ALL THE TIME 3. I USE MY TRAINING MOST OF THE TIME 4. I USE MY TRAINING ABOUT HALF THE TIME 5. I HARDLY EVER USE MY TRAINING 6. I NEVER USE MY TRAINING 0. NO ANSWER

Q.23A. IF YOU WANTED TO LEARN SOME EDUCATIONAL SUBJECT, WHICH KIND OF COURSE WOULD YOU RATHER TAKE*  1. A CORRESPONDENCE COURSE - THE INSTRUCTOR SENDS YOU THE LESSONS BY MAIL AND YOU SEND THEM BACK TO HIM BY MAIL TO BE CORRECTED 2. A SELF-TEACHING COURSE - YOU ARE GIVEN ALL THE BOOKS, TESTS AND OTHER THINGS YOU NEED AND YOU DO ALL THE STUDYING BY YOURSELF AND CORRECT YOUR OWN PAPERS 3. A CLASS - A GROUP TAKING THE SAME COURSE MEET TOGETHER AND AN INSTRUCTOR PRESENTS THE MATERIAL, LEADS DISCUSSIONS, GIVES ASSIGNMENTS AND TESTS 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.23B. WHAT KINDS OF SUBJECTS WOULD YOU PERSONALLY LIKE MOST TO TAKE UP IF THERE IS A TIME LAPSE BETWEEN THE TIME THE WAR IS OVER AND YOUR RETURN BACK INTO CIVILIAN LIFE*  1. HIGH SCHOOL SUBJECTS 2. TRADE SCHOOL SUBJECTS 3. BUSINESS SCHOOL SUBJECTS 4. MILITARY SUBJECTS 5. COLLEGE SUBJECTS 6. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 23C NOT CODED.

Q.23D. IF YOU TAKE ANY COURSES WHILE YOU ARE IN THE ARMY IS IT IMPORTANT THAT YOU GET CREDITS FOR THEM TOWARD SCHOOL OR COLLEGE GRADUATION*  1. YES, IT IS IMPORTANT 2. NO, IT IS NOT IMPORTANT 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. WHAT WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. WORKING 2. GOING TO SCHOOL 3. LOOKING FOR WORK 4. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER I. IF YOU WERE WORKING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY, PLEASE ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS ABOUT IT: X. QUESTIONS 24A, 24B AND 24C NOT CODED.
Q.25. WAS THE KIND OF WORK YOU DESCRIBED ABOVE YOUR MAIN OCCUPATION*  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 25A AND 25B NOT CODED.

Q.26. IF YOU WANTED IT, AND COULD DO THE WORK, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD GET THE SAME JOB BACK YOU HAD BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. YES 2. NO 3. HAVE NO IDEA 4. I WASN,T WORKING BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 26A NOT CODED.

Q.27. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE MOST TO DO AFTER YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY*  1. WORK AT A FULL-TIME JOB (EITHER FOR SELF OR OTHERS) 2. GO TO SCHOOL FULL-TIME 3. STAY IN THE ARMY 4. HAVE NO IDEA 5. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.28. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD WANT TO GO BACK TO THE SAME SORT OF THING YOU WERE DOING BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY (THAT IS, JOB, SCHOOL, ETC.*)  1. WOULD LIKE TO DO THE SAME SORT OF THING 2. WOULD LIKE TO DO SOMETHING ELSE 3. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 29 NOT CODED.

Q.30. DO YOU THINK YOU NEED ANY KINDS OF TRAINING OR SCHOOLING IN ORDER TO GET INTO THE CIVILIAN WORK YOU EXPECT TO DO*  1. YES, I NEED A GREAT DEAL OF TRAINING 2. YES, I NEED A LITTLE TRAINING 3. NO, I DO NOT NEED ANY TRAINING 4. I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT I WILL DO AFTER I GET OUT OF THE ARMY 5. I PLAN ON STAYING IN THE ARMY 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.32. DO YOU USE THE CIVILIAN TRAINING AND EXPERIENCE YOU HAD BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB OR ASSIGNMENT*  1. YES, MOST OF THE TIME 2. YES, ONCE IN A WHILE 3. NO, NEVER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.33. HOW MANY YEARS WAS IT BETWEEN THE TIME YOU LEFT FULL-TIME SCHOOL AND THE TIME YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. ONE YEAR OR LESS 2. OVER ONE YEAR UP TO TWO YEARS 3. OVER TWO YEARS UP TO FIVE YEARS 4. OVER FIVE YEARS 5. I CAME INTO THE ARMY RIGHT OUT OF SCHOOL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.34. IF YOU WERE OFFERED A GOOD JOB WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TURN IT DOWN AND GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL, OR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD TAKE THE JOB*  1. I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO TO SCHOOL, EVEN IF I HAD TO PAY MY OWN WAY 2. IF THE GOVERNMENT PAID ALL MY EXPENSES, I WOULD TURN THE JOB DOWN AND GO TO SCHOOL 3. I WOULD TAKE THE JOB AND NOT GO TO SCHOOL, EVEN IF THE GOVERNMENT PAID ALL MY EXPENSES 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.35. IF YOU COULD DO WHAT YOU WANTED, WHICH WOULD YOU RATHER DO WHEN YOU GET OUT OF THE ARMY, - GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR GO TO PART-TIME SCHOOL*  1. I WOULD RATHER GO TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL 2. I WOULD RATHER GO TO PART-TIME SCHOOL 3. UNDECIDED 4. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN GOING TO SCHOOL AT ALL WHEN I GET OUT OF THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER

Q.36A....WHAT KIND OF SCHOOL WILL YOU GO TO*  1. TRADE SCHOOL 2. BUSINESS SCHOOL 3. HIGH SCHOOL 4. COLLEGE (UNDERGRADUATE) 5. SOME OTHER KIND OF SCHOOL 6. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN GOING TO SCHOOL AT ALL WHEN I GET OUT OF THE ARMY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 36B NOT CODED.
